definition: to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to
Caesarea (town in Israel, between Tel Aviv and Haifa)

sentences.english: Caesar, William the Conquerer allopted for a full invasion of England.
sentences.chinese: 凱撒，威廉這樣的征服者都選擇完全的侵略英格蘭。

sentences.english: Caesar Palace Hotel is a foreign-related business-type hotel.
sentences.chinese: 凱撒皇宮大酒店是一家商務涉外型酒店。

sentences.english: We must show all honours to the ambassadors of Caesar.
sentences.chinese: 對凱撒的使臣，我們可要禮數週全。

sentences.english: The Caesar cipher is easy to break.
The phantom of the slain Caesar appeared to Brutus in a dream.
sentences.chinese: 布魯圖斯夢中幻覺殺死凱撒。

sentences.english: The Caesar's Legion is comprised mostly of reconditioned tribals and their descendants.
sentences.chinese: 凱撒軍團主要由被其征服的部落以及他們的後代組成。

sentences.english: Caesarea was 90km north west of Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 凱撒利亞在耶路撒冷東北90公里。

sentences.english: "Some were thrilled that Caesar had died, and some were horrified, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “對於凱撒的死，有人激動，有人驚悸，”他講道。

sentences.english: You mean Square MK2 pre-orders are before Caesar's?
sentences.chinese: 你的意思是方塊2預定在凱撒之前？

sentences.english: Mrs. Wu will have the filet mignon with baked potato and Caesar salad.
sentences.chinese: 吳太太要小牛排，加烤馬鈴薯和凱撒沙拉。

sentences.english: Caesar Salad with Garlic Croutons, Bacon, Quail Eggs and White Anchovies.
sentences.chinese: 凱撒沙律配蒜香麪包幹，培根，鵪鶉蛋伴白鳳尾魚。

sentences.english: We will fully and ungrudgingly render to Caesar what is Caesar's.
sentences.chinese: 我們將完全而慷慨地將凱撒的歸給凱撒。

sentences.english: We will fully and ungrudgingly render to Caesar what is Caesar's.
sentences.chinese: 我們將完全而慷慨地將凱撒的歸給凱撒。

sentences.english: One of them was Caesar 's closest friend, Brutus.
sentences.chinese: 其中一位是凱撒最親近的朋友，布魯特斯。

definition: variant of 拿破崙|拿破仑[Na2 po4 lun2]
Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
Brooklyn, borough of New York City
Jeanne d'Arc (1412-1431), French heroine and liberator, executed as a witch by the Burgundians and English/also called Jehanne Darc, the Maid or Orleans, Joan of Arc or St Joan
